mapper.select: SELECT a.announce_no, a.m_admin_no, a.type_code, a.announce_title, a.announce_date, a.announce_view_count, t.code_description FROM announce AS a INNER JOIN type_code AS t ON a.type_code = t.type_code ORDER BY a.announce_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT a.announce_no, a.m_admin_no, a.type_code, a.announce_title, a.announce_date, a.announce_view_count, t.code_description FROM announce AS a INNER JOIN type_code AS t ON a.type_code = t.type_code WHERE t.code_description = #{type} ORDER BY a.announce_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(a.announce_no) FROM announce AS a INNER JOIN type_code AS t ON a.type_code = t.type_code WHERE t.code_description = #{type}

SELECT a.announce_no, a.m_admin_no, a.type_code, a.announce_title, a.announce_body, a.announce_date, a.announce_view_count, t.code_description FROM announce AS a INNER JOIN type_code AS t ON a.type_code = t.type_code WHERE a.announce_no = #{announceNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO announce ( m_admin_no, type_code, announce_title, announce_body, announce_date, announce_view_count ) VALUES ( #{memberNo}, #{typeCode}, #{announceTitle}, #{announceBody}, NOW(), 0 )
